description: This is the core file configuration for the gameplay, the value should be in a double quote "" for any type.

rank_references.description: The variable manages the rank reference. It enables cross-server ranking among servers using the same reference. If each server requires a specific ranking, a different reference is needed for each server.

minimum_points.description: The minimum number of points required to be in the global rank.

minimum_session_points.description: The minimum number of points required to be in the rank of the current map session.

minimum_players.description: The minimum number of players to activate point gain/loss.

host.description: The host address for the database.

port.description: The port for the database connection.

description: This is the points configuration files, the value should be in a double quote "" for any type.

points_loose_kill_weapon.description: Points lost for killing with a weapon.

points_loose_kill_weapon_hs.description: Points lost for headshot kills with a weapon.

points_loose_kill_knife.description: Points lost for killing with a knife.

points_win_kill_weapon.description: Points earned for killing with a weapon.

points_win_kill_assist.description: Points earned for assisting in a kill.

points_win_kill_weapon_hs.description: Points earned for headshot kills with a weapon.

points_win_kill_knife.description: Points earned for killing with a knife.

points_win_bomb_planted_player.description: Points earned for planting the bomb (individual).

points_win_bomb_planted_team.description: Points earned for planting the bomb (team).

points_win_bomb_exploded_player.description: Points earned for the bomb exploding (individual).

points_win_bomb_exploded_team.description: Points earned for the bomb exploding (team).

points_win_bomb_defused_player.description: Points earned for defusing the bomb (individual).

points_win_bomb_defused_team.description: Points earned for defusing the bomb (team).

description: This is the translation file. The key should be the local that you want to use.

language.description: This is the language used for the translations.

TOP_PLAYERS_TITLE_SESSION.description: Title for the session's top players.

TOP_PLAYER.description: Template for displaying individual player in the top.

RANK_RESET.description: Message when a player's rank is reset.

BOMB_PLANT_PLAYER.description: Message when a player plants the bomb.

BOMB_PLANT_TEAM.description: Message when the bomb is planted and points are awarded to all terrorists.
BOMB_PLANT_TEAM.default_value: {GREEN}The bomb has been planted, {LIGHTGREEN}+%i {GREEN}points to all terrorists

BOMB_DEFUSED_PLAYER.description: Message when a player defuses the bomb.

BOMB_DEFUSED_TEAM.description: Message when the bomb is defused and points are awarded to all counter-terrorists.
BOMB_DEFUSED_TEAM.default_value: {GREEN}The bomb has been defused, {LIGHTGREEN}+%i {GREEN}points to all counter-terrorists

BOMB_EXPLODED_PLAYER.description: Message when a player detonates the bomb.

BOMB_EXPLODED_TEAM.description: Message when the bomb explodes and points are awarded to all terrorists.

DEATH_SUICIDE.description: Message when a player commits suicide.

TEAMKILL.description: Message when a player kills a teammate.

KILL_KNIFE.description: Message when a player kills an enemy with a knife.
KILL_KNIFE.default_value: {LIGHTGREEN}+%i points{GREEN}, you killed an enemy with a knife

KILL_ASSIST.description: Message when a player assists in killing an enemy.
KILL_ASSIST.default_value: {LIGHTGREEN}+%i points{GREEN}, you assist to kill an ennemy

DEATH_BY_KNIFE.description: Message when a player is killed with a knife.
DEATH_BY_KNIFE.default_value: {LIGHTRED}-%i points{RED}, you were killed with a knife

KILL_HEADSHOT.description: Message when a player kills an enemy with a headshot.
KILL_HEADSHOT.default_value: {LIGHTGREEN}+%i points,{GREEN} you killed an enemy with an headshot

DEATH_BY_HEADSHOT.description: Message when a player is killed with a headshot.
DEATH_BY_HEADSHOT.default_value: {LIGHTRED}-%i points{RED}, you were killed with an headshot

KILL_WEAPON.description: Message when a player kills an enemy with a weapon.

DEATH_BY_WEAPON.description: Message when a player is killed by an enemy weapon.

NO_DB_AUTHICATED.description: Message when a player is not authenticated to the database.
NO_DB_AUTHICATED.default_value: {RED}You are not authenticated to our database

MISSING_POINTS.description: Message when a player is missing points to be in the rank.
MISSING_POINTS.default_value: {RED}You are missing {LIGHTRED}%i points {RED}before being in the rank

IGNORE_ANNOUCE_DESABLE.description: Message when a player disables announcements.

IGNORE_ANNOUCE_ENABLE.description: Message when a player enables announcements.

RANK_NOT_FOUND.description: Message when a player's rank cannot be found.
RANK_NOT_FOUND.default_value: {LIGHTGREEN}We cannot find your rank, please contact an administrator

RANK.description: Message displaying the player's current rank.

RANK_SESSION.description: Message displaying the player's current rank for the session.
RANK_SESSION.default_value: {GREEN}You are currently ranked {LIGHTGREEN}%i {GREEN}for the current session

STAT_POINTS.description: Message displaying the player's points in statistics.

STAT_KILL.description: Message displaying the player's kills in statistics.

STAT_DEATH.description: Message displaying the player's deaths in statistics.

STAT_ASSIST.description: Message displaying the player's assists in statistics.

STAT_TEAMKILL.description: Message displaying the player's team kills in statistics.

STAT_SUICIDE.description: Message displaying the player's suicides in statistics.

STAT_HEADSHOT.description: Message displaying the player's headshots in statistics.

STAT_KNIFE.description: Message displaying the player's kills with a knife in statistics.

CHAT_FLOODING.description: Message displayed when a player is suspected of chat flooding.
CHAT_FLOODING.default_value: {RED}We know that you are the best !
